thread.title: Man United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is 'carrying' Jose Mourinho’s side, says Jamie Carragher | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is 'carrying' Jose Mourinho’s side, says Jamie Carragher | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic is 'carrying' Jose Mourinho’s side, says Jamie Carragher | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 8:02 pm Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho (Picture: Getty) 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic is ‘carrying’ Manchester United through the current campaign, according to Liverpool great Jamie Carragher. 
The Swedish superstar, who joined the Red Devils on a free transfer last summer, took his tally for the season to 26 at the weekend. 
Ibrahimovic scored a brace at Wembley to ensure United beat Southampton 3-2 in the EFL Cup final, and Carragher admits his performances have been ‘unbelievable’. 
‘I think it’s unbelievable what we’re watching,’ Carragher said on Monday Night Football. 
‘Zlatan throughout his career, there was always a feeling in England, that he was a flat track bully. He won everything in Italy but in Champions League games against English sides, it never quite happened. Zlatan Ibrahimovic has been in fine form under Jose Mourinho (Picture: Getty) Jamie Carragher has hailed Ibrahimovic’s influence at Old Trafford (Picture: Getty) 
‘But to think that after the age of 30, he’s got 200 goals. You think of Andriy Shevchenko, one of the best strikers in the world, he found it too difficult [in the Premier League].
